name: Hex Arena
description:
Hex Arena was made for the GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours from the 14th-16th of July 2017.

The game is designed to emphasise crowd control, as you have to prioritise different enemy types to ensure you don't get overwhelmed. If five enemies of the same type surround you, they'll attack.

The download contains the .exe file and a zip folder with the data inside. Please ensure the non-zipped data folder is in the same location as the .exe folder before running.
